name: Hubot for Slack: Brigade Edition
description: One-button deploy for Hubot on Heroku with Slack adapter, customised for Code for America Brigades.

HUBOT_HEROKU_KEEPALIVE_URL.description: URL of the hosted app. Use the App Name chosen above.

HUBOT_SLACK_TOKEN.description: The token you are given after adding Hubot integration: https://slack.com/apps/A0F7XDU93-hubot

HUBOT_SLACK_TEAM.description: Your team's Slack subdomain. e.g. if your team is https://myteam.slack.com/, you would enter 'myteam' here.

HUBOT_CFA_CHECKIN_DEFAULT_EVENT.description: The event name used when not specified during `hubot checkin` command.

HUBOT_CFA_BRIGADE_ID.description: The brigade ID assigned by the CfA API. Find it here: http://codeforamerica.org/api/organizations?q=YourCity
